dmca.title: DMCA Complaints
dmca.body:
EMAIL

http://btbeat.com/news_index1309.html
http://btbeat.com/modules.php?op=modload&name=News&file=article&sid=1309

**This complainant already has a signature on file with us.
Below, please find the original complaint:

From: 	[private] <[private]@musicbox-online.com>
To: 	[private]@google.com
Date: 	Tue, 02 Oct 2007 14:23:34 -0500
Local: 	Tues, Oct 2 2007 12:23 pm
Subject: 	DMCA Complaint 38.0
I am writing to file a charge that btbeat.com is in violation of U.S.
copyright laws. Our signature currently is on file with Google.

Search Query: "Some songs are just destined to become a predictable part"

Please note that there are other queries that generate this result.


The infringing articles (starting with the 2nd paragraph, which begins
"Some songs are just destined to become a predictable part of a band's"
and continuing through the end of the text) can be found at:

http://btbeat.com/news_index1309.html
http://btbeat.com/modules.php?op=modload&name=News&file=article&sid=1309


The copyrighted work at issue was published at:

http://www.musicbox-online.com/bt-truth.html


The posting of this material infringes upon the copyright held by me and
my company The Music Box. I may be contacted at the email address and
phone number listed below.


There is no contact information on the btbeat.com site. Its registration
contact information is as follows:

Private, Registration [private]@domainsbyproxy.com
Domains by Proxy, Inc.
DomainsByProxy.com
[private], [private]
Scottsdale, Arizona[private]
United States
[private]

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized
by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

[private]
Editor, The Music Box
[private]@musicbox-online.com
[private]
